Title: The Hounds of Baskerville
Writer: Mark Gatiss, Steven Moffat (created with), Arthur Conan Doyle (based on the works of)
Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs, Rupert Graves
Plot: Sherlock and John investigate the ghosts of a young man who has been seeing monstrous hounds out in the woods where his father died.
